definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import xspress3 ds.result = xspress3.triggermode_cb(commonblock, "$(name)", ds.$(name)_triggermode, ds.$(name)_nbframes, "$(hostname)", "$(device)", "$var.filename", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", "$(__insname__)", ds.$(name)_filedir, ds.$(name)_fileprefix, ds.$(name)_framesperfile, ds.$(name)_maskdatatowrite, ds.$(name)_mcalength, ds.$(name)_savedata, "$var.acq_modes")
$datasources.$(name)_triggermode $datasources.$(name)_nbframes $datasources.$(name)_fileprefix $datasources.$(name)_filedir $datasources.$(name)_framesperfile $datasources.$(name)_maskdatatowrite $datasources.$(name)_mcalength $datasources.$(name)_savedata
